trans-unit.source: Represents the style for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat" /> object.
This class is used primarily by control developers.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle> class encapsulates the properties that control the appearance of a Web server control for automatic formatting at design time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle>類別會封裝在設計階段的自動格式設定的 Web 伺服器控制項的外觀屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can specify the background color, font color, and the vertical alignment of a control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle.VerticalAlign%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由設定指定的背景色彩、 字型色彩和控制項的垂直對齊<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.BackColor%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style.ForeColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle.VerticalAlign%2A>屬性，分別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormatStyle" /> class using default values.
Gets or sets the vertical alignment of the contents for the associated control.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign> property to specify the vertical alignment of the contents for the associated control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign>屬性可指定相關聯的控制項內容的垂直對齊方式。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign> property does not apply to an associated control, the setting is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign>屬性不適用於相關聯的控制項，此設定會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: For the defined values for the vertical alignment enumeration, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign>.
trans-unit.target: 垂直對齊方式列舉的定義值，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.VerticalAlign>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to use a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat> object and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat.Style%2A> property to apply formatting to a control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat>物件和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerAutoFormat.Style%2A>將格式套用至控制項的屬性。
